caption.p: Expression patterns of apomixis-related transcripts across reproductive developmental stages from premeiosis to anthesis. a Argonaute 104 (TRpn_185717). b Gibberellin receptor GID1 (TRpn_57024), c, d ORC3b (TRpn_33086, TRpn_96407). e, f APOSTART2 (TRpn_175767, TRpn_52614). Repd: reproductive mode. Red lines: apomictic libraries. Blue lines: sexual libraries
